pull.title: BIP129: add requirements header
pull.body: BIP 129 requires several prerequisite BIPs, so state them in a "Requires" header.

labels.name: Pending acceptance
labels.description: This BIP modification requires sign-off by the champion of the BIP being modified

events.body: cc BIP authors @hugohn and @nvk for sign-off
(Is BIP 322 still required? Is this BIP still relevant?)
This PR will need a rebase.

> This PR will need a rebase.

Thanks, done.
Looking over this again, this seems fine.

comments.diff_hunk:
@@ -11,6 +11,7 @@
   Type: Specification
   Assigned: 2020-11-10
   License: BSD-2-Clause
+  Requires: 32, 174, 322, 380, 381, 382, 383
comments.body: I would prefer if @hugohn, @nvk, or another author signed off on this, but given that all of these BIPs are explicitly mentioned (BIP174 in the Motivation, and it seems that the Roles refer to the PSBT roles [although they use Coordinator instead of Creator?] and the rest explicitly under Prerequisites), this change seems pretty uncontroversial to me.
